posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
I have available a T3 card of Frank Smith.  It would grade a strong 4, except that it has two pinholes.  This card was rejected by PSA because it is about 1/8 of an inch too wide to fit their holders.  $190, or will trade for a card that is already PSA graded or raw that will grade.  Scans available, including a scan of the rejection notice from PSA categorizing it as "size too big".

Posted By: Mark
The card is sold.
